title: Tokyo Gas Eyes US Investments to Drive Growth
description: Tokyo Gas plans to invest in US downstream assets to lift earnings and reinforce the last leg of its energy supply chain. Japan’s biggest distributor of the fuel is looking to deploy capital in assets like liquefaction plants, export terminals and the energy services sector, Tokyo Gas president Shinichi Sasayama told Bloomberg's Shery Ahn during an interview in Tokyo. (Source: Bloomberg)
